About the product

Impurities in your water directly impacts your health, causing dry skin, baby rashes, sticky hair, and hair fall. It leaves scales in taps, showers and pipelines, which slowly clogs and chokes the flow of water.Our Particle Filters can rapidly purify drinking water to make it safe and healthy. Apart from protecting the pipelines and sanitary ware, it also softens skin, protects hair, reduces soap consumption and extends the life of water appliances.Designed for easy use, our Multi-grade Filters (MGF) look presentable when placed in your homes. Impurities in your water directly impacts your health, causing dry skin, baby rashes, sticky hair, and hair fall.

Frequently asked questions

A whole house water filtration system is installed where your main water line enters your home, addressing problem water issues throughout your home. These systems are designed to reduce contaminants like chlorine, iron, arsenic and sulfur, providing cleaner water for drinking, bathing, cooking and cleaning.
